actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, relating to contract authority of the United States Postal Service for air transportation of mail.

summary.text: Eliminates mail weight restrictions concerning Postal Service contracts for the transportation of mail by air. Repeals the requirement that such contracts be submitted to the Civil Aeronautics Board for review.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, relating to contract authority of the United States Postal Service for air transportation of mail.
